summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Section 6.2, 12.1 and 14.2 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to modify the outdoor play area requirement for day care centers, and dividing Section 6.2 into Sections designated 6.20 through 6.22, and dividing Section 12.1 into Sections designated 12.10 through 12.13.
